meta.title: Stress Test | Professional Assessment - SAMEBI
meta.description: Scientifically validated stress level test for psychologists. Free assessment in 5 minutes with personalized recommendations.
meta.keywords: stress test, psychological assessment, burnout, anxiety, psychologists international

landing.title: Professional Stress Test
landing.subtitle: Scientifically Validated
landing.description: Assess your stress level in just 5 minutes with our professional, evidence-based test. Developed by psychologists for psychologists.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.testimonial1: An excellent tool for initial assessment of my clients.
testimonials.testimonial2: The results are accurate and the recommendations very helpful.
testimonials.testimonial3: Saves me a lot of time in initial consultations.

cta.title: Ready for Your Stress Test?
cta.description: Start now and get a scientifically founded analysis of your stress level in just 5 minutes.

test.title: Stress Level Assessment
test.subtitle: Answer the following 15 questions honestly and spontaneously
questions: I feel overwhelmed by my daily tasks
I have difficulty relaxing
I worry about things beyond my control
I feel tired even after getting enough sleep
I have difficulty concentrating
I react irritably to small problems
I have physical symptoms like headaches or tension
I avoid social situations or activities
I have difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep
I feel emotionally exhausted
I feel like I have no control over my life
I find it difficult to make decisions
I have frequent mood swings
I feel disconnected from others
I have recurring negative thoughts
test.instructions: Select the answer that best applies to you:
questions: I feel overwhelmed by my daily tasks
I have difficulty relaxing
I worry about things that are beyond my control
I feel tired, even after getting enough sleep
I have difficulty concentrating
I react irritably to small problems
I have physical symptoms like headaches or muscle tension
I avoid social situations or activities
I have difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep
I feel emotionally exhausted
I feel like I have no control over my life
I frequently ruminate about problems
I feel time pressure, even with simple tasks
I have difficulty making decisions
I feel overwhelmed by my responsibilities

interpretations.low: Your stress level is in the normal range. You seem to handle daily challenges well.
interpretations.moderate: Your stress level is slightly elevated. It would be advisable to take preventive measures.
interpretations.high: Your stress level is significantly elevated. We recommend seeking professional support.
interpretations.critical: Your stress level is critically high. Please contact a psychologist or doctor immediately.

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
moderate: Seek social support from family and friends
high: Review of current life and work situation needed
critical: Immediate relief from stress factors necessary
Inform trusted people about your situation

emailCapture.title: Get Results by Email
emailCapture.description: Enter your email address to receive your test results:
emailCapture.consent: I agree that my email address may be used to send the test results.
emailCapture.privacy: Your data will be treated confidentially and will not be shared with third parties.

detailedAnalysis.title: Get Detailed Analysis
detailedAnalysis.description: Receive a comprehensive 15-page analysis of your stress level with specific action recommendations.
features: Resources and exercises for daily life
